citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:40 AM and
12:40 PM on 06/23/2014.
Spoke to the licensee by cell phone and he had previous obligations scheduled for today.
